flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: I used  3/4"  MDF for this and routed out the cavities for the parts with a 1/2" round bit on a router table.  The slots are every 1 inch on center and about 5/16" deep. That leaves 1/2" between the slots to  put the labels for the contents of the slot.  The slots are about 3" long to accommodate 1/4 watt resistors and diodes.
lines.text_raw: I used  3/4"  MDF for this and routed out the cavities for the parts with a 1/2" round bit on a router table.  The slots are every 1 inch on center and about 5/16" deep. That leaves 1/2" between the slots to  put the labels for the contents of the slot.  The slots are about 3" long to accommodate 1/4 watt resistors and diodes.

guide.summary:
I needed a better way to store and find resistors, diodes etc.
I had a drawer that was too shallow to use for most things but found it perfect for this project.
guide.title: Electronics Parts Storage
